Policy FAQ

Do I need culinary experience?

No. We teach portion accounting, storage rhythm, and reheat sequencing from the ground up.

Are plans medical?

Programs are wellness-oriented and can be coordinated with your licensed care team.

Can teams attend together?

Yes. Corporate reserve cohorts run Monday through Thursday with private vault desks.
